Package universityProject.dev.academicEntities

Class News

java.lang.Object
universityProject.dev.academicEntities.News
public class News extends Object
Version:
18.12.2023 The News class represents a news article within the academic entities of the university. It contains information such as the news ID, title, content, comments, and topic.
Author:
Asyl
